# TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.disabled

**Case**

Use this value to disable the dead zone.

## Declaration

```swift
case disabled
```

## Interaction zones

- **TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.default**: The default dead zone values.
- **TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.within(distance:angle:)**: Allows to customize the dead zone values. The object will start moving when the first of these two thresholds is reached.

items.description: Allows to customize the dead zone values. The object will start moving when the first of these two thresholds is reached.
items.name: TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.within(distance:angle:)
